title: Security Vunerability in Next js 15.3.1 for babel/runtime
body:
### Link to the code that reproduces this issue

https://github.com/search?q=repo%3Avercel%2Fnext.js%20babel%2Fruntime&type=code

### To Reproduce

Security Vunerability in Next js 15.3.1 for babel/runtime

Issue path : /node_modules/next/dist/compiled/@babel/runtime/package.json

Next js 15.3.1 is having babel/runtime which is having security vunerabilities and need to be fixed . Current Babel/runtime version 7.22.5 need to be upgraded to 7.26.10

### Current vs. Expected behavior

Currenty it is having version with security vunerability . We need to upgrade overcome that issue 

### Provide environment information
